      • addHandler

        public void addHandler(EventHandler handler)
        Description copied from interface: EventLoop
        Add handler to event loop to be executed. Event loops should execute handlers in order of priority. Handlers with same priority have no guarantee of execution order. Handlers will not be executed before EventLoop.start() has been called.
        Specified by:
        addHandler in interface EventLoop
        Parameters:
        handler - handler

      • start

        Description copied from interface: EventLoop
        Start the event loop

        Description copied from interface: EventLoop
        Typical implementation will unpause the event loop's Pauser
        Specified by:
        unpause in interface EventLoop

      • stop

        public void stop()
        Description copied from interface: EventLoop
        Notify event loop to stop executing handlers. It is not expected that event loops can then be restarted
        Specified by:
        stop in interface EventLoop
